mapper.insert: insert into tag( user_id, tag_name, created_at, updated_at )values ( #{userId}, #{tagName}, sysdate(), sysdate() )
mapper.select: select count(1) from article_tag where tag_id = #{tagId}

select t.id, t.tag_name, count(atg.id) as article_count, t.created_at, t.updated_at from tag t left join (select id, article_id, tag_id from article_tag) atg on t.id = atg.tag_id group by t.id
where tag_name like concat('%', #{tagName}, '%')
